agreement_COD_STATE: select codeval2 codeval, codeval2 codetxt from jsharmony.ucod2_country_state where codeval1='USA' and (codetdt is null or (codetdt is not null and codetdt > current_date)) order by codseq,codeval2
agreement_COD_MONTH: select mth as codeval,mth as codetxt from jsharmony.V_MONTHS order by N
agreement_COD_YEAR: select yr as codeval,yr as codetxt from jsharmony.V_YEARS order by yr
agreement_sign: insert into jsharmony.RQST(rqst_source, rqst_atype, rqst_aname, rqst_parms) values('CLIENT', 'REPORT', 'AGREEMENT',@rqst_parms);

insert into jsharmony.RQST_D(rqst_id, d_scope, d_scope_id, d_ctgr, d_desc) select (select rqst_id from jsharmony.RQST where rowid = last_insert_rowid()), 'C',@c_id, 'AGREEMNT', 'Customer Portal Agreement';
agreement_paymentresult: select pacc_sts "pacc_sts",pacc_pp_result "pacc_pp_result",C_PRE.c_id "c_id",C_PRE.pe_id "pe_id",new_client_result "new_client_result",pe_ll_tstmp "pe_ll_tstmp" from C_PRE left outer join jsharmony.CPE on C_PRE.pe_id=CPE.pe_id where C_PRE_ID=@payment_id and pacc_fp_hash=@fp_hash;
agreement_cod_c_id: select c_id as codeval,c_name as codetxt from C where 1=1 %%%DATALOCKS%%% order by c_name
agreement_report_N: select N.c_id "c_id",n_type "n_type",n_eu,strftime('%m/%d/%Y',n_etstmp) as n_etstmp,n_note from jsharmony.N inner join C on C.c_id=N.c_id where N.c_id=@c_id %%%DATALOCKS%%%
